description: Zapi Group s.p.a is a company that designs and manufactures electronic systems for electric vehicles, such as forklifts, pallet trucks, and aerial work platforms. As a Test Engineer, I am responsible for testing the electronic systems developed by the company, including hardware and software. I work closely with the R&D team to ensure that the products meet the required specifications and quality standards.

K-Loops s.r.l is a software development company that specializes in robotics solutions. As a Software Engineer, I was responsible for developing and mantaining company software products. I worked on Computer Vision with Python and on robot programming with KRL (KUKA Robot Language).

ElettroSoftware s.r.l is a software development company that specializes in industrial automation solutions. As a Software Engineer, I was responsible for developing and mantaining company software products. I worked on PLC programming with B&R Automation Studio.
